abstracts.cdata!:
The Afghanistan public financial
            management reform project has two development objectives:
            (i) develop an efficient and effective public financial
            management system; and (ii) develop the human resource
            capacity of the Ministry of Finance and Control and Audit
            Office to ensure better operation of public financial management.
